text: aur jab unamen se ek jamaat ne (un logon mein se jo shumbe ke din shikaar ko mana karate the) kaha ki jinhen khuda halaaq karana ya sakht azaab mein mubtila karana chaahata hai unhen (bephaayade) kyo naseehat karate ho to vah kahane lage ki phaqat tumhaare paravaradigaar mein (apane ko) ilzaam se bachaane ke lie yaayad isalie ki ye log parahezagaaree ekhtiyaar karen
